question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Miks on Kota Bogor Indoneesias tuntud kui "Vihma linn"?
answer: Kota Bogor Indoneesias on tuntud kui "Vihma linn", sest seal on aastas v√§ga suur sademete hulk ja sagedased vihmasajud.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor in Indonesia is known as the "Rainy City" because of the very high annual rainfall and frequent downpours.
